subcategory.name: Helical Parallel Shaft Gearbox
subcategory.additionalAccessories: Heat Exchnager / Cooling Coil/ Cooling Fan with Cover / Shrink Disc / Hold Back /Temperature, Flow & Pressure Sensors /Lubricating Pump System. Applications: Bridle Drives / Bucket Conveyor Drives/ Kiln Drives / Ball Mill Drives / Crushers /Paper Machine Drives / Mixing Drives /Agitating Drives / Hoisting Drives / Turbine Drives.
subcategory.productDetail: Esenpro EP Series Helical Gearbox is designed and manufactured such that the most favorable balance is achieved between strength and surface durability ratings, noise level, and efficiency.
specialFeature: Scientific study of dimensions and tolerances
Sophisticated method of computerized calculation of gear tooth geometry
Helical Gears and Pinions manufactured with Ni, Cr, Mo-alloy steel and case-carburized heat treatment process to achieve a hardness of 58-62 HRC
Gears, Pinions, and Housings manufactured on high precision machine tools
Gears and Pinions are Profile ground to achieve DIN 5/6 quality or better.
Stringent quality control

subcategory.name: Bevel Helical Right Angle Gearbox
subcategory.additionalAccessories: Heat Exchnager / Cooling Coil / Cooling Fan with Cover / Shrink Disc / Hold Back / Temperature, Flow & Pressure Sensors/Lubricating Pump System. Applications: Bucket Conveyor Drives / Kiln Drives /Ball Mill Drives / Crushers / Pulper Machine Drives /Mixing Drives / Agitating Drives / Hoisting Drives /Cooling Tower Drives / Apron Feeder Drives.
subcategory.productDetail: Esenpro EP Series Bevel Helical Gearbox is designed and manufactured such that the most favorable balance is achieved between strength and surface durability ratings, noise level, and efficiency. Esenpro Bevel gears are based on the Gleason and Klingenberg Spiral Bevel technology. All our bevel sets are either lapped / hard finished or ground corresponding to the application.
specialFeature: Scientific study of dimensions and tolerances
Sophisticated method of computerized calculation of gear tooth geometry

Helical Gears and Pinions manufactured with Ni, Cr, Mo-alloy steel and case-carburized heat treatment process to achieve a hardness of 58-62 HRC and subsequently profile ground to achieve DIN 5/6 quality or better.
Gears, Pinions, and Housings manufactured on high precision machine tools
Stringent quality control

subcategory.name: EP Series Industrial Gearbox
subcategory.additionalAccessories: Heat Exchanger / Cooling Coil / Cooling Fan with Cover / Shrink Disc/ Hold Back/ Temprature, Flow & Pressure Sensor/ Lubricating Pump System.
subcategory.applications: Bridle Drives/ Bucket Conveyor Drives/ Kiln Drives/ Ball Mill Drives/ Crushers/ Paper Machine Drives/ Mixing Drives/ Agitating Drives/ Hosting Drives/ Turbine Drives.

subcategory.name: CEP Series Crane Duty Gearbox
subcategory.drive: Main Hoist / Cross Travel / Long Travel Reduction Ratio: 20/1 - 315/1
subcategory.inputOutputShaft: Single & Double Extension as per customer specification
subcategory.applications: Steel Handling Cranes / Port Handling Cranes/ Material Handling & Lifting Cranes / EOT Cranes/ Overhead Cranes
subcategory.lubrication: Forced Lubrication for all vertical mounting gearbox
specialFeature: The gearboxes are available in three and four-stage reduction.
The gearbox can be designed in both horizontal and vertical mounting positions with a forced lubrication system incorporated for vertically mounted gearboxes.
The housings are designed with fabricated steel IS 2062 / Equivalent EN grade and are duly stress relieved and shot blasted.
The housings are designed with fabricated steel IS 2062 / Equivalent EN grade and are duly stress relieved and shot blasted.

subcategory.name: EA Series Aerator Gearbox
subcategory.productDetail: Helical Gear Units specially designed for Aerator and Agitator Application. Aerator / Agitator Gear Units are available in single and double reductions. The gear units can be provided with or without a motor.
specialFeature: Special gearbox housing design to take care of external loads on the output shaft.
Field-proven gear units with constantly upgraded design and technology.
Specially designed and manufactured to suit out-door applications.
Gear unit designed to attain maximum dynamic stability.
Wide range of reduction ratios for selection.
Additional features like pump arrangement, cooling coil, dry well, and slipping clutch are available as per customer requirement.

subcategory.name: Single Screw
subcategory.productDetail: Esenpro High Power Energy Efficient Single Screw Helical Extruder Gearbox is designed to withstand continuous running. The gearbox is specially designed to withstand high torque and absorbing the high thrust load generated by the Extrusion machines.
subcategory.housing: Split Casing with integrated thrust housing  Forced Lubrication for all vertical mounting
specialFeature: Extruder gearbox is capable to take a high axial thrust load
The Gear Unit is incorporated with Spherical Roller Thrust bearing.
An external lubrication system can be provided along with Heat Exchanger.
Gear rating is based on AGMA D104 & bearing life calculation is based on DIN ISO 281.
Shaft configuration can be offered with single, double, and multiple keyways or with a splined shaft for extruder screw engagement.
Barrel mounting can be matched to suit customer requirements by providing additional flanges on extruder mounting faces.
